thread.title: Anna

author: Anna
title: Anna
text: If you put an item in your cart and want to keep shopping, the book you put in there may be taken out if someone else buys it first. I understand they want to make a sale, but how ridiculous! Unless they want to charge no tax or shipping, I can't keep attempting to buy books from here. It's absolutely aggravating. Imagine being in an actual store, and other people were allowed to just grab your items out of your cart because they couldn't find it elsewhere. I'd no longer shop there, or fights would start.
